items.name: Bloody Knife
items.description: This thing is sharp and' pointy, could probably be used as a weapon

items.name: Sword
items.description: Wow! I've never held a sword before, this is definitely an upgrade from that crappy knife

items.name: Creepy doll
items.description: You see a weird looking doll, sitting on a chair in the middle of the room. Perhaps putting it somewhere will reveal the secrets of this house

items.name: Key 1
items.description: You have found 1 of the 3 keys that lie in this house. Find the other 2 keys to unlock the passage to the cellar and save your friend from the horrors within the house.

items.name: Key 2
items.description: This key is one of the last to find, hurry to save your friend in time!

items.name: Key 3
items.description: Congratulations on finding the last key, but don’t celebrate just yet. Head down to the cellar to figure out what’s next.

items.name: Master Key
items.description: Master key was created with all three keys. Use the key to unlock the cellar to save your friend.

items.name: Riddle
items.description: I don't have eyes, but once I did see. Once I had thoughts, but now I'm white and empty. The answer is a skull.

items.name: Pistol
items.description: You have chosen a pistol. It only has 5 bullets inside so fire wisely.

items.name: Introductory note
items.description: We have your friend. To find your friend you must collect items around the house and decide which ones can be used. Remember, if you fail, we come for you.

items.name: Explanation note
items.description: To win and help save your friend, you must collect three keys. These are the only things that you can do.

items.name: Bat
items.description: You have chosen the baseball bat. It looks like it’s pretty old, maybe from the 1900s.

items.name: A.K 47
items.description: You have chosen an A.K 47. This weapon has insane accuracy and aim, great to defend you and your friend.

items.name: Pitch Fork
items.description: You have chosen a Pitch Fork. Quick and hurry to save your friend!”

items.name: Plastic Spoon
items.description: You have chosen a plastic spoon. You never know, this might come in handy. Fred is hot
